01cf3fda-931d-43a0-b220-6eace429af9c.name: Double-Jointed
01cf3fda-931d-43a0-b220-6eace429af9c.notes: May ignore up to -5 in penalties for close quarters

5464838f-ea77-4681-9d83-5ee2a4c4f96b.name: Diffuse
5464838f-ea77-4681-9d83-5ee2a4c4f96b.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

26c00427-1092-411d-a682-c32cd8fe3b34.name: Homogenous
26c00427-1092-411d-a682-c32cd8fe3b34.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

e404a0b2-3ded-493a-afd7-9d30b466e166.name: No Blood
e404a0b2-3ded-493a-afd7-9d30b466e166.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

27e0adee-487c-40a8-a07c-9058f7c83f63.name: No Brain
27e0adee-487c-40a8-a07c-9058f7c83f63.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

47491d21-6295-4b01-a913-62d07ddd0f06.name: No Eyes
47491d21-6295-4b01-a913-62d07ddd0f06.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

d899fff4-1182-4c18-b052-8111b2e0b667.name: No Head
d899fff4-1182-4c18-b052-8111b2e0b667.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

662ad274-7772-4e2a-a4ac-347bd40a18f1.name: No Neck
662ad274-7772-4e2a-a4ac-347bd40a18f1.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

7ec9b4c2-0463-4b71-9a30-cc40f655270e.name: No Vitals
7ec9b4c2-0463-4b71-9a30-cc40f655270e.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

15a1ab73-7f7e-48bf-b782-3a55f5cf1690.name: Unliving
15a1ab73-7f7e-48bf-b782-3a55f5cf1690.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
